Little_Rock.White-Baucum House: The White-Baucum House is a historic house at 201 South Izard Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is an L-shaped two story wood frame house, with a hip roof extending over two stories of balconies in the crook of the L, giving the building an overall rectangular footprint. It has Italianate styling, with a bracketed and dentillated eave, spindled porch balustrades, and an elaborate front entry in a round-arch surround.
